Localized Magento Editions: The Localized Magento Editions (LME) are a project by the Community for the Community. The editions were created to make the start into Magento as simple as possible. The project was initiated by the Netresearch App Factory. With integer_net there are experienced and dedicated developers for the lead of implementationin the team, who have integrated the most important and best exensions together with the Community.
